YEAR 1   //   WEEK 25

Social Mobility
Big Issues
Attainment Gap

Covid-19 and social mobility

Elliot-Major, Machin [2020]

The Covid-19 pandemic has negatively impacted social mobility in the UK. In education, this has already had a disproportionatly detrimental impact on the most disadvantaged children in society.
